title: Trump considers another White House expansion for 'symmetry'
shortDescription: President Trump's ballroom architect said he is exploring the construction of an additional second story to the White House's West Wing colonnade

title: House fails to override Trump vetoes
shortDescription: The House could not clear the two-thirds majority needed overturn President Trump's first two vetoes of his second term.

title: Senate votes to block Trump from Venezuela action
shortDescription: The bipartisan measure will halt further American military intervention in Venezuela without congressional approval.

title: Republicans vote to advance Senate measure to halt Trump in Venezuela
shortDescription: The Senate advanced a bipartisan measure to halt further American military action in Venezuela without congressional approval.

title: Trump braces for potential 3rd impeachment. What's been tried so far
shortDescription: Donald Trump is the only US president to be impeached twice. Some lawmakers tried again in 2025, but Trump is worried about 2026 midterms elections.

title: Fulton County could have to pay Trump $6.2 million for election case
shortDescription: Following the dismissal of a case against President Trump alleging election interference, his attorney has requested $6.2 million for legal fees.

title: Trump, pharmaceutical companies strike deal to cut drug prices
shortDescription: U.S. President Donald Trump and nine major pharmaceutical companies on Friday (December 19) announced deals that will slash the prices of their medicines for the government's Medicaid program and for cash payers, in his latest bid to align U.S. costs with those in other wealthy nations.

title: Trump pulls US out of 66 major global groups
shortDescription: President Trump's decision to withdraw the U.S. from 66 major global organizations includes United Nations talks on climate change and the oceans.

title: Trump reveals how long he expects US to control Venezuelan oil
shortDescription: Trump said US control of Venezuelan oil after the military removal of Nicolas Maduro could last years, in an interview with the New York Times.

title: Can citizens record ICE or other law enforcement? Know your rights
shortDescription: A federal immigration agent's fatal shooting of a woman in Minnesota has sparked questions about the public's right to observe law enforcement.

title: Rep. Hoyer to retire from Congress after more than 40-year career
shortDescription: Democratic Rep. Steny Hoyer of Maryland is the third-longest serving member of the House of Representatives.

title: Trump calls for $1.5T defense budget to build 'dream military'
shortDescription: "Our Military Budget for the year 2027 should not be $1 Trillion Dollars, but rather $1.5 Trillion Dollars," Trump wrote on Truth Social on Jan. 7.

title: Trump withdraws US from 66 international organizations and treaties
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said the United States will withdraw from 66 international treaties and working groups with interests "contrary" to America.
